description:
Flames is a capivating and simple fire app.  Use it:  To set a romantic mood, in place of your lighter at your next concert, to let someone know they will burn, for a relaxing diversion, to tell someone they are hot, or just feel a little warmer...  The app includes the sound of fire and an everchanging (not a loop) computer generated flame.  Sound can be turned on and off by tapping the screen.   Note: This app does not actually generate heat and can not be used for cooking.
Based on xflame under GPLv3.
